activities: Safecore provides hosted global message archiving services to companies which have global information.  As a course of business Safecore does not gain access to any client data without client authorization or approval.  Data is secure and not accessible to anyone except our clients.  Safecore is not in the business of distributing any information, but provides a secure "Digital Archive" as a repository to enable our clients to meet regulatory requirements, compliance mandates, legal discovery and best practices for data management.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
